jobs.jobDescription: We are looking to hire a dynamic Angular Developer to join our global team. As an Angular developer, you will be required to build a top-quality coding base. You will also be required to create amazing user interfaces for desktop and mobile apps.
jobs.address: 417, Sumerru Business Corner, Nr. Somchintamani Appt., B/H Rajhans Multiplex, Pal Gam, Surat 395009, Gujarat, India
jobs.briefJobDescription:
• Determine the functional, non-functional requirements and scope working with the business analysts and engineering managers
  • Design and develop multi-tier, cloud-native, high performance, and scalable solutions
  • Apply software engineering principles, design patterns and best practices to build solutions that are testable, secure, and robust
  • Lead cross functional agile teams across the software development lifecycle
  • Lead cross functional agile teams across the software development lifecycle
jobs.jobRequirement:
Years of Experience: 5+ years
Relevant hands-on experience with one of more of the following:
  • Web technologies - JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3
  • Web frameworks – Angular / React JS
  • Mobile frameworks – React Native
  • Web server technologies - Node.js / Nginx

jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for a Business Development Engineer who is Coordinate with Business development Manager in problem solving, resourcing and budgeting activities.
jobs.address: 417, Sumerru Business Corner, Nr. Somchintamani Appt., B/H Rajhans Multiplex, Pal Gam, Surat 395009, Gujarat, India
jobs.briefJobDescription:
• Assist marketing team in preparing market plans and strategies to promote company’s products.
  • Analyze existing and potential markets to identify and secure business development opportunities.
  • Establish and maintain a customer relations management database.
  • Maintain strong relationship with customers for future business growth.
  • Work with internal teams to achieve targeted business goals.
jobs.jobRequirement:
Years of Experience: 5+ years
Relevant hands-on experience with one of more of the following:
  • Experience in sales, marketing or related field.
  • Excellent organizational skills.
  • Proficient in Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint.
  • Strong communication skills and IT fluency.

jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for a HR Manager to oversee all aspects of human resources practices and processes and who is Develop and implement HR strategies and initiatives aligned with the overall business strategy.
jobs.address: 417, Sumerru Business Corner, Nr. Somchintamani Appt., B/H Rajhans Multiplex, Pal Gam, Surat 395009, Gujarat, India
jobs.briefJobDescription:
• Manage the recruitment and selection process.
  • Bridge management and employee relations by addressing demands, grievances or other issues
  • Nurture a positive working environment
  • Maintain pay plan and benefits program
  • Assess training needs to apply and monitor training programs
jobs.jobRequirement:
Years of Experience: 5+ years
Relevant hands-on experience with one of more of the following:
  • Knowledge of HR systems and databases
  • Degree in Human Resources or related field
  • Ability to architect strategy along with leadership skills
  • Excellent active listening, negotiation and presentation skills

jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for a Content Writer to join our editorial team and enrich our websites with new blog posts, guides and marketing copy.
jobs.address: 417, Sumerru Business Corner, Nr. Somchintamani Appt., B/H Rajhans Multiplex, Pal Gam, Surat 395009, Gujarat, India
jobs.briefJobDescription:
• Write clear marketing copy to promote our products/services
  • Prepare well-structured drafts using Content Management Systems
  • Proofread and edit blog posts before publication
  • Submit work to editors for input and approval
  • Coordinate with marketing and design teams to illustrate articles
jobs.jobRequirement:
Years of Experience: 5+ years
Relevant hands-on experience with one of more of the following:
  • Portfolio of published articles
  • Experience doing research using multiple sources
  • Familiarity with web publications
  • BSc in Marketing, English, Journalism or related field
